item.description:
Here we go again....you're invited to join us for another happy hour at Coogan's in the Faneuil Hall area to imbibe your favorite social lubricant.

I will arrive at 5 and hang until about 9....later if the music sounds good.

I'll have free Baileys, Kahlua, & Malibu treats for you.

Free food specials from 5PM until 7PM

Trivia contest begins at 7...Motley Meetup tied for third last time.

Let's do better, so come out to share the useless information in your head.

Coogan's Link

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I should be the only one wearing a tiara.
item.why: Meet people who enjoy the pleasures of a good drink in a fun place
item.name: Third Time's a Charm
